Declaring \w and|strong="G2532"\w* insinuating \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w rise|strong="G0450"\w* \w again|strong="G0450"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* preach \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* believed, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* associated \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* served \w God|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Gentiles \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* noble \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w few|strong="G3641"\w*.

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jason|strong="G2394"\w* hath \w received|strong="G5264"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w do|strong="G4238"\w* \w contrary|strong="G0561"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w decrees|strong="G1378"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w Caesar|strong="G2541"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w king|strong="G0935"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* thou bringest \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* new \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* our \w ears|strong="G0189"\w*. \w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w would|strong="G5100"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w mean|strong="G1510"\w*.
